articles.title: Mapping Burns and Natural Reforestation using Thematic Mapper Data
articles.authors: Lopez Garcia, M., and V. Caselles
articles.your_summary:
Using thematic mapper is a good way to differentiate areas easily. This was done in the article by taking the study area and 
        monitoring its vegetation by using different bands. The study showed differences in vegetation within collecting data for one or two months after the fire.

articles.title: Landscape Assessment: Remote Sensing of Severity, the Normalized Burn Ratio; and Ground Measure of Severity, the Composite Burn Index.
articles.authors: Key, C. and N. Benson, N
articles.your_summary: Fires that affected a large area is identified by landscape assessment. This study shows how the fire affects the vegetation and its surface.
